name: The Silver Project
description: The Silver Project addresses the complex health challenges people with HIV face as they get older. Patients undergo health assessments that culminate in a comprehensive over-50 wellness visit, in which the patient and provider review the assessment results and work together to develop an individualized five-year health plan.

Patients undergo health assessments that culminate in a comprehensive over-50 wellness visit, in which the patient and provider review the assessment results and work together to develop an individualized five-year health plan.
whatTheyOffer: The Silver Project addresses the complex health challenges people with HIV face as they get older. Patients undergo health assessments that culminate in a comprehensive over-50 wellness visit, in which the patient and provider review the assessment results and work together to develop an individualized five-year health plan.
howToGetIt: Call our front desk at (415) 353-2119. If you are a new patient, please ask for the New Patient Coordinator.
